rules.title: Gateway bind is not loopback
rules.fix: Bind gateway to 127.0.0.1 or localhost and place it behind a secure reverse proxy if external access is needed.

rules.title: Missing gateway auth token/password
rules.fix: Configure a strong auth token or password for the gateway and load it from environment variables.

rules.title: Telegram bot token found in config
rules.fix: Remove bot token from tracked config files and load it from environment variables or a secret store.

rules.title: Workspace path outside allowed OpenClaw root
rules.fix: Use a workspace under /Users/ddq/openclaw or update policy if this path is intentional.

rules.title: Default gateway port exposure risk
rules.fix: Change port from default and bind to loopback or protect with network controls.

rules.title: Possible plaintext secret in workspace file
rules.fix: Remove plaintext secrets and move them to environment variables or a secret manager.
